body:
Try to use UIPreviewActionItem instead.

@available(iOS 9.0, *)
override var previewActionItems: [UIPreviewActionItem] {

    let item1 = UIPreviewAction(title: "Item1", style: .default) {
        (action, vc) in
        // run item 1 action
    }

    let item2 = UIPreviewAction(title: "Item2", style: .destructive) {
        (action, vc) in
        // run item 2 action
    }

    return [item1, item2]
}
title: Why is UIPreviewActionStyle destructive title not red?
